results.name: BLOWFLY-DungHole Wanderer(绿蝇侠-粪窟漫游者)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
